PERSONA:
meet alex, a 35-year-old liberal white man living in a metropolitan area on the west coast. as a college graduate with a stable income over $100,000, he enjoys the comforts of middle-class life in the pacific region.

alex is married but does not identify with any particular religion, considering himself unaffiliated. he is an independent voter who leans towards the democratic party due to his very liberal ideological views. despite never attending religious services, alex tries to maintain a moral compass through volunteerism and community involvement.

an avid internet user, he spends several hours online daily, keeping up with current events and engaging in online discussions. alex is a registered voter who takes his civic duties seriously, always ensuring he is registered at his current address.

with his educational background and progressive mindset, alex embraces diversity and open-mindedness. he values equality, social justice, and environmental protection, aligning himself with liberal causes. while he may not always agree with the democratic party's stance on every issue, he finds their platform more closely aligned with his personal beliefs.

in his free time, alex enjoys exploring the vibrant cultural offerings of his metropolitan area, from art exhibitions to live music events. he cherishes the opportunity to engage with people from various backgrounds and learn about different perspectives, further broadening his worldview.
